div.bibl: Illinois Staats-Zeitung, Dec. 11, 1875. [BENEFIT PRODUCTION FOR DISPENSARY]

body.p: The theatrical representation which will be given next Wednesday for the benefit of the German American Dispensary should be attended by all the Germans who are able to make a little offering for charitable purposes. All the money made by the play will be given to the Dispensary.
The play, "The Painter", by Adolph Wilbrandt, presents the life of an artist with all his pecularities.
